ExportItemConfig.Query: SELECT m.id,m.name,m.usr,m.exp,m.avatar,m.sex,m.birthday, m.phone,lv.name as level_name,m.level,m.state,ac.integral,ac.balance,ac.total_pay, ac.present_balance,m.reg_time,m.last_login_time FROM mm_member m INNER JOIN mm_relation r ON m.id = r.member_id INNER JOIN pt_member_level lv ON lv.value = m.level INNER JOIN mm_account ac ON m.id = ac.member_id WHERE lv.merchant_id={merchant_id} AND r.reg_merchant_id = {merchant_id} AND (m.name LIKE '%{keyword}%' OR m.usr LIKE '%{keyword}%' OR m.phone LIKE '%{keyword}%') AND ({level_value}<0 OR m.level={level_value}) AND ({state} <0 OR m.state={state}) ORDER BY m.reg_time DESC LIMIT {page_start},{page_size}
ExportItemConfig.Total: SELECT COUNT(0) FROM mm_member m INNER JOIN mm_relation r ON m.id = r.member_id INNER JOIN pt_member_level lv ON lv.value = m.level INNER JOIN mm_account ac ON m.id = ac.member_id WHERE lv.merchant_id={merchant_id} AND r.reg_merchant_id = {merchant_id} AND (m.name LIKE '%{keyword}%' OR m.usr LIKE '%{keyword}%' OR m.phone LIKE '%{keyword}%') AND ({level_value}<0 OR m.level={level_value}) AND ({state} <0 OR m.state={state})
